value: This is my only response
No further questions

Literally me rn
This says everything
I rest my case

Sorry I can't talk, I'm currently beefing with my own reflection.

I'm not saying I caused that, but I'm also not NOT saying it.
Honestly? Vibes. Just pure vibes.
Can we blame the government or is this on you?
My advice is legally questionable but emotionally correct.
I'm gonna pretend you didn't just say that to me.

Oh, so we're doing THIS today. Alright.

This definitely counts as cardio because my heart rate is up.

That's either a blessing or a threat, no in-between.
Sorry, wrong number. Unless this is about money.
I've seen enough Netflix documentaries to walk away from this.

I'd respond but my lawyer said absolutely not.

I'm not judging you, but God might be.

That's funny because I also have zero self-control.

Plot twist: I actually support this energy.

Sorry, I only respond to bad decisions.
This message made me sit up straight like a meerkat.

I'm choosing chaos. What now?
